about_the_game:
"Trauma" takes place in the dreams of a girl burdened with trauma. As her cherished koala doll, you will explore a surreal world and exorcise nightmares!

This game is created with respect to numerous classic walking simulators, featuring ever-changing fields that transform to keep the gameplay engaging. The only action players can perform, other than walking, is stabbing with a knife, which serves as a metaphor for overcoming trauma and is the key to completing the game.

Horror elements are generously incorporated, providing a proper dose of tension. The dark and melancholic atmosphere builds a unique world, offering both terror and solace to the player. Enjoy this bizarre dream world, accompanied by newly composed ambient BGM crafted specifically for this game.

The number of endings is one.

content_descriptors.notes: There are mild depictions of blood and violence.

detailed_description:
"Trauma" takes place in the dreams of a girl burdened with trauma. As her cherished koala doll, you will explore a surreal world and exorcise nightmares!

This game is created with respect to numerous classic walking simulators, featuring ever-changing fields that transform to keep the gameplay engaging. The only action players can perform, other than walking, is stabbing with a knife, which serves as a metaphor for overcoming trauma and is the key to completing the game.

Horror elements are generously incorporated, providing a proper dose of tension. The dark and melancholic atmosphere builds a unique world, offering both terror and solace to the player. Enjoy this bizarre dream world, accompanied by newly composed ambient BGM crafted specifically for this game.

The number of endings is one.

name: 虎馬 / Trauma

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 (4th generation or later)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or equivalent
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 (4th generation or later)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570 or equivalent
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: "Trauma" is a walking simulator action-adventure game sprinkled with horror elements. The only action you can perform besides walking is stabbing with a knife. Enjoy your journey into the strange world of dreams.
